text:
Forget Harvard. Forget Google. Forget Coursera. 

Nvidia just dropped 11 (free) guides:

Get all official guides here: https://lnkd.in/eu2mj4aS 

1. Generative AI Explained
A simple intro to how gen AI works. No coding required.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gWYkmDvu

2. Building A Brain in 10 Minutes
Learn how neural networks think in under 10 min.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gGqkT-Wz

3. AI for All: From Basics to GenAI Practice
From machine learning basics to creative AI tools.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gjSpDWcB

4. Getting Started with AI on Jetson Nano
Build your first neural network with hands-on notebooks.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gDSvADsW

5. Introduction to AI in the Data Center
Learn GPU architecture and AI deployment basics.
Link: https://lnkd.in/g_nQsRaX

6. An Even Easier Introduction to CUDA
Start parallel programming on GPUs. Beginner-friendly.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gvs-ni9D

7. Introduction to NVIDIA NIM Microservices
Build, deploy, and scale AI models the simple way.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gXMnQ7t9

8. Generative AI in Digital Health
Build AI chatbots for healthcare and clinical notes.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gKGxf4ye

9. AI Weather Models with NVIDIA Earth-2
Explore AI for weather prediction and climate apps.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gReNCv8n

10. Accelerated Computing with CUDA C/C++
GPU computing fundamentals. Start with vector addition.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gUf8jYaM

11. Generative AI with NeMo
Customize text and multimodal AI models easily.
Link: https://lnkd.in/gFvsRzuU

Bonus:

✦ Start with AI: https://lnkd.in/d2BQW-w6
✦ Remove emdashes: https://lnkd.in/dCjcTz_A
✦ Be rude to ChatGPT: https://lnkd.in/d8NuedC8 
✦ To not sound like AI: https://lnkd.in/gB66hGJp 
✦ Access all AI courses: https://lnkd.in/gqbwYsPv
✦ Prompt nano banana pro: https://lnkd.in/dqKd-qGM
✦ Stop prompting like 2022: https://lnkd.in/dFaAfYBj 
✦ Train your AI on YouTube: https://lnkd.in/dETcRzku 

___

PS: I'm @Ruben Hassid, and I want us to master AI before it masters us, with simple instructions.

Follow me never to miss my 2x daily posts.

You want to help someone in your network?
